trans-unit.source: Represents a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> tab group that dynamically displays controls that are only relevant in a particular context.
trans-unit.target: 表示动态显示仅在特定上下文中相关的控件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> 选项卡组。

trans-unit.source: You use a *contextual tab* to display groups of commands that are relevant only in a particular context.
trans-unit.target: 你使用*上下文选项卡*用于显示组的相关仅在特定上下文中的命令。

trans-unit.source: Contextual tab groups are shown or hidden based on specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: 上下文选项卡组是显示还是隐藏基于指定的条件。

trans-unit.source: For example, an Ink Tools tab group might be shown when tablet input is detected, or a Picture Tools tab group might be shown when an Image object is selected.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当检测到平板电脑输入，或可能选定映像对象时显示的图片工具选项卡组，则可能显示墨迹工具选项卡组。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> named **Pens** that is in the **Ink Tools** contextual tab group.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab>名为**钢笔**，位于**墨迹工具**上下文选项卡组。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content of the contextual tab group header.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置上下文选项卡组标头的内容。

trans-unit.source: The content of the contextual tab group header.
trans-unit.target: 上下文选项卡组标头的内容。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 已注册的默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅[依赖项属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.Header" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.Header" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the format that is used to display the header content as a string.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于显示标头内容的字符串格式。

trans-unit.source: The format that is used to display the header content as a string.
trans-unit.target: 将标头内容显示成字符串的格式。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 已注册的默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅[依赖项属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.HeaderStringFormat%2A> property is only used when there is no header template.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.HeaderStringFormat%2A>没有标头模板时，才使用属性。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.HeaderStringFormat" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.HeaderStringFormat" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> that is used to display the contents of the header.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于显示标头内容的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" />。

trans-unit.source: A template that specifies the visualization of the header.
trans-unit.target: 指定标题的可视化的模板。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 已注册的默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅[依赖项属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.HeaderTemplate" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.HeaderTemplate" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom logic for selecting a <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> that is used to display the contents of the header.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于显示标头内容的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> 的自定义逻辑。

trans-unit.source: A custom <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector" /> object that provides logic and returns a <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个自定义 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector" /> 对象，它提供逻辑并返回一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" />。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 已注册的默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅[依赖项属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.HeaderTemplate%2A> property to specify the visualization of the header.
trans-unit.target: 你使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.HeaderTemplate%2A>属性指定的标头的可视化效果。

trans-unit.source: If you have more than one template defined and want to specify logic that selects a template to use, then you use this property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有多个模板定义，并想要指定逻辑，以便选择要使用模板，则可以使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is ignored if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.HeaderTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 如果忽略此属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.HeaderTemplate%2A>属性设置。

trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.HeaderTemplateSelector" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.HeaderTemplateSelector" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonContextualTabGroupAutomationPeer" /> object for this control.
trans-unit.target: 为此控件创建新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonContextualTabGroupAutomationPeer" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A new automation peer object for this control.
trans-unit.target: 此控件的新自动化对等对象。

trans-unit.source: The old value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.Header" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.Header" /> 属性的旧值。

trans-unit.source: The new value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.Header" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.Header" /> 属性的新值。

trans-unit.source: Called when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.Header" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.Header" /> 属性更改时调用。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown" /> 路由事件的类处理。

trans-unit.source: This method captures the mouse when a single-click occurs on the contextual tab group.
trans-unit.target: 单键单击发生上下文选项卡组上时，此方法将捕获鼠标。

trans-unit.source: It minimizes or maximizes the window when a double-click occurs.
trans-unit.target: 它最小化，或双击发生时将窗口最大化。

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将标记<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>事件处理的设置<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性的事件数据的`true`。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseUp" /> routed event and releases the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseUp" /> 路由事件的类处理，然后释放鼠标。

trans-unit.source: This method releases the mouse capture and sends click notifications to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法释放鼠标捕获，并发出单击通知到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>。

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseUp> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将标记<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseUp>事件处理的设置<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性的事件数据的`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that this control belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 获取对此控件所属的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> 的引用。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that this control belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 获取对此控件所属的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> 的引用。

trans-unit.source: This property is used to access visual style brushes defined on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于访问上定义的视觉样式画笔<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>类。

trans-unit.target: 无
